companies.name: Apple
companies.description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California, that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services. It is considered one of the Big Four technology companies, alongside Amazon, Google, and Microsoft.[6][7][8]

companies.name: Amazon
companies.description: Amazon.com, Inc.[7] (/ˈæməzɒn/), is an American multinational conglomerate technology company based in Seattle, with 750,000 employees.[8] It focuses on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence. It is considered one of the Big Four tech companies, along with Google, Apple, and Microsoft.[9][10][11] It has been referred to as one of the most influential economic and cultural forces in the world.
